name: key-sync
description: Tiny VSCode Extension Synchronize **only** keybinding configuration.

commands.title: Key Sync: Save keyboard shortcuts to local repository
Key Sync: Load local repository json file to keyboard shortcuts

key-sync.GitRemoteRepository.description: Specifies an existing git remote repository. Example: `https://github.com/hw104/vscode-keybindings.git`
key-sync.GitRemoteRepository.markdownDescription: Specifies an existing git remote repository. Example: `https://github.com/hw104/vscode-keybindings.git`

key-sync.GitBranch.description: Specifies an existing git branch. Example: `main`, `master`, `windows`, `linux`
key-sync.GitBranch.markdownDescription: Specifies an existing git branch. Examples: `main`, `master`, `windows`, `linux`

key-sync.GitSrcPath.description: Specifies an existing json file path. Examples: `keybindings.json`, `key/keybindings_win.json`.
key-sync.GitSrcPath.markdownDescription: Specifies an existing json file path. Examples: `keybindings.json`, `key/keybindings_win.json`.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
